resources.string: Administrative building of Osun state university, Osogbo, it is located directly from the main gate of the main campus. It is also called the senate building, it is named after Prof. Peter Okebukola, who is the pioneer Pro-Chancellor and Chairman of Governing Council of the institution.
It is the biggest Auditorium in the institution, it is named after former Governor Price Olagusoye Oyinlola. It is located along the Enterpreneur building
This is the faculty of engineering and it is named after the immediate Governor of Osun state, Enrg. Rauf Aregbesola. It is the biggest building in Osun state university.
The building is function of entreneurship. Training and workshop
This is the health centre of the institution. It also includes the pharmacy

Central library is where educational books are kept. And it can be found along tetfund building in the main campus of uniosun. It is named after Prof. Sola Akinrinde, the first Vice Chancellor of the university and was completed on November 2016. It is a two storey building with different units/sections.
This is the main entrance of the Institution. It is located along Ibokun way, Oke-baale, Osogbo Osun State
this building is located behind the admin building in the campus. Its name is the acronym for SCIENCE ENGINEERING AND TECHNOLOGY
This is the first lecture theatre in the institution. It is completed in the year 2016. It is popularly called the twins lecture theatre.
this is one of the latest building in the institution.
This is school water factory closer to entrepreneur building
This is the Faculty of Environmental sciences. It is popularly known as URP building. Is almost the last building inside the campus.
